content:
I just noticed our .github/workflows/release-process.yml says we should be checking the build status of https://buildkite.com/embark-studios/wasmtime-aarch64-apple-darwin, but it looks like that has been failing for a while. (I think they just need to add the Rust wasm32-unknown-unknown target in addition to wasm32-wasi that they've already configured with rustup.) Should we still be listing this as something to check during Wasmtime's release process?

wasmtime-aarch64-apple-darwin · Embark Studios
Branches for wasmtime-aarch64-apple-darwin: Pipeline for cloning and testing wasmtime on aarch64-apple-darwin
